m_szDocTitle: Technological feasibility and costs of achieving a 50 % reduction of global GHG emissions by 2050: mid- and long-term perspectives | SpringerLink
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- July 2012 , Volume 7, Issue 2 , pp 139–156 Technological feasibility and costs of achieving a 50 % reduction of global GHG emissions by 2050: mid- and long-term perspectives Authors National Institute for Environmental Studies Tatsuya Hanaoka National Institute for Environmental Studies Open Access Special Feature: Original Article Socio-technological transitions First Online: Social mentions: 2 Abstract In this article we examine the technological feasibility of the global target of reducing GHG emissions to 50 % of the 1990 level by the year 2050. We also per
